triggers: how do i goldenize and keep it base
how do i goldenize and keep it level 4
entries.response:
To goldenize and keep a Pokémon base/Level 4:

1) Teach the Pokémon a **non-damaging move** (for example: Haze).
2) Let that Pokémon **faint** in the battle.
3) Switch to a **higher-level Pokémon** to defeat the Eevee.

Because the goldenized Pokémon did not deal damage, it will remain base/Level 4.

triggers: what are the current golden day golds
entries.response:
The **current Golden Day golds** are listed in:

• The **pinned messages** in the Trades channel
• The **event announcements** on Discord

Always check those locations for the most up-to-date list.

triggers: how do you make a pokemon golden
how to make a golden pokemon
entries.response:
To goldenize a Pokémon:

• Solve the **community riddle** to find **3 Pokémon and 3 items**.
• Place the Pokémon in the **first three slots** of your roster.
• Attach the **corresponding items** to those Pokémon in the correct order.
• Go to the **Evolution Gym**.
• Defeat the Eevee.

After the battle, the **first Pokémon in your roster becomes golden**.

triggers: can i goldenize on christmas and new years
goldenize on christmas and new years
do christmas and new years count separately
are christmas and new years separate golden days
entries.response:
Yes. **Christmas and New Year’s count as separate Golden Days**.

Even though they usually share the same goldens, you may goldenize your **full allowed amount on each day**.

triggers: how many goldens can i make
how many golds can i make
entries.response:
Golden limits depend on activity:

**Active users**:
• 1 golden per account per Golden Day
• Up to **5 total per Golden Day**
• Applies separately to:
  – Christmas
  – New Year’s
  – August 2nd

**Inactive users**:
• 1 golden per Golden Day
• Total of **2** during Christmas/New Year’s
• **1** on August 2nd

triggers: what days can i make golds
entries.response:
You can goldenize on the following **Golden Days**:

• **Christmas Day** — December 25
• **New Year’s Eve + Day** — December 31 & January 1 (counts as **one** Golden Day)
• **Shrimpy’s Birthday** — August 2

triggers: i won a contest when will i receive my prize
when do i get my contest prize
how long does contest prize take
entries.response:
Contest prize delivery can vary.

• Some prizes are delivered **instantly**
• Others may take **some time**, depending on the contest
• Mods often **transfer prizes directly to your account**

If you haven’t received a trade notification, **check your account** — the prize may already be there.
